comment: Good app for backing up photos safely. NEEDS a lock photo and lock album feature that is password protected for extra security (for sentitive documents, etc), where previews of the album cannot be seen from the photos homepage. Archive is not secure enough especially since you cannot lock any albums. This would be a useful feature when letting someone you know borrow your phone. The search feature is quite useful in finding specific photos though.
scenarios: NEEDS a lock photo and lock album feature that is password protected for extra security, where previews of the album cannot be seen from the photos homepage.
Archive is not secure enough especially since you cannot lock any albums.
key sentence: NEEDS a lock photo and lock album feature that is password protected for extra security, where previews of the album cannot be seen from the photos homepage.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to navigate to library/memories/search, cast content, back up photos, favorite items, and access various editing and sharing options.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Add to album', 'description': 'Add this photo to an album'}, {'name': 'Move to Archive', 'description': 'Move this photo to archive'}, {'name': 'Delete from device', 'description': 'Delete this photo from the device'}, {'name': 'Create', 'description': 'Create something related to this photo'}, {'name': 'Move to Locked Folder', 'description': 'Move this photo to a locked folder'}, {'name': 'Edit', 'description': 'Edit the date/time of the photo'}, {'name': 'Add a caption', 'description': 'Add a caption to this photo'}, {'name': 'Effects', 'description': 'Apply effects to this photo'}, {'name': 'Search Inside this Photo', 'description': 'Search text inside the photo.'}]

operations.event: click<button id=8 class ="com.google.android.apps.photos:id/photos_pager_menu_move_to_mars"> Move to Locked Folder,  </button>
